snippet: A federal judge has ordered the Rowan County clerk, Kim Davis, to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
abstract: Federal Judge David Bunning orders Kentucky's Rowan County clerk Kim Davis to issue marriage licenses to gay couples; Davis is among handful of local officials nationwide who refused to do so on religious grounds following Supreme Court decision in favor of gay marriage.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has ordered the Rowan County clerk, Kim Davis, to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.

headline.main: Kentucky: Clerk Ordered to Issue Wedding Licenses to Same-Sex Couples
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Clerk Ordered to Issue Wedding Licenses to Same-Sex Couples

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
